job.title: Senior Software Engineer / Software Engineer - Bioinformatics & Lab Informatics
job.description: <p><strong>Description</strong></p><p>Arzeda is a world-leader in protein design and synthetic biology. Leveraging our core expertise in structure-based computational protein design, machine learning and high-throughput testing, we design novel proteins and bio-catalytic processes for the sustainable production of performance ingredients and materials. A deep tech, mission-driven company, we are passionate about our mission to design novel proteins and products that enhance our lives and protect our planet.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Arzeda is searching for a talented software engineer to help build the largest and most comprehensive set of enzyme &amp; protein engineering data the world has seen. This is an opportunity to solve a rich and diverse set of problems crucial to the execution and tracking of the high-throughput laboratory experiments necessary to generate that dataset. You will work with a multi-disciplinary team and play a leading role in crafting the breadth of software tools necessary to enable streamlined workflows across all experimental activities at Arzeda, including genetic design, assay development &amp; testing, analytical chemistry, and strain engineering.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The preferred work location for this position is Seattle, Washington. However, remote work from other U.S. locations is a possibility. The position comes with a competitive salary and benefits, including health insurance, dental insurance, and paid time off, commensurate with applicant qualifications.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Developing software tools, workflows, and user interfaces for scientists executing high-throughput laboratory experiments, such as NGS and high-throughput enzyme assays.</li><li>Developing extensions for our LIMS and interfacing services to the LIMS.</li><li>Developing registries and databases of biological materials such as DNA and organisms.</li><li>Collaborating with scientists to produce actionable software specifications and requirements.</li><li>Communicating software engineering objectives, approaches, and outcomes to internal stakeholders.</li><li>Mentoring fellow software engineers.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Fluency in Java and/or Python.</li><li>Software development experience, including modern software practices such as version control and automated testing.</li><li>Experience developing bioinformatics or laboratory workflows, and/or biological databases.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Inquiries and Applications</strong></p><p>Please apply here on LinkedIn or send your CV and a cover letter to jobs[at]arzeda.com with the subject line “Software Engineer - Informatics”.</p><p><br></p><p><em>Arzeda Corp. (www.arzeda.com) is an equal opportunity employer promoting diversity and inclusion in the workspace.</em></p>
